description: Mark an object as Evidence in a container

inputs.description: The object to mark as evidence. This could be a vault_id, artifact_id, note_id, container_id, or actionrun_id. If the previous playbook block is an action then "keyword_argument:results" can be used for the actionrun_id with the content_type "actionrun". Vault_id can be an ID or a vault hash.
inputs.name: input_object
inputs.placeholder: artifact id, note id, vault_id, etc.

inputs.description:
The content type of the object to add as evidence which must be one of the following:
            
            vault_id
            artifact_id
            container_id
            note_id
            actionrun_id
inputs.name: content_type
inputs.placeholder: See help text for supported types
